product_desc: The ultimate goal of the AC-Squared software is to become the premier program that all Orthotics & Prosthetics companies use.  This software will be able to handle all the billing, scheduling, ordering, and management of patient information in the workplace.  We will help lower cost to the distributor and manufacture which will cascade down to the consumer then finally the patient.  We wish to create a cost-effective program that is efficient for the everyday technician and owner.  Simplifying certain processes in their daily routine will allow for less opportunities to create mistakes.  This software will work with distributors and manufactures by allowing the client to purchase materials from them within the software itself.
name: AC-Squared
